name: LineBreak
description: Detects and removes hard line breaks that are not supported in DITA

vale_rule.message: Hard line breaks are not supported in DITA.

ai_analysis.implementation_notes: Hard line breaks in AsciiDoc are achieved through various syntaxes that need to be removed for DITA compatibility. The fix involves removing the syntax markers while preserving the text content.

implementation_details.algorithm:
1. Detect line break syntax patterns
2. Remove the syntax markers
3. Preserve the actual text content
4. Handle edge cases like comments and code blocks
edge_cases: Line breaks within comments should be ignored
Line breaks within code blocks should be preserved
Line breaks at the end of files
